name: LolBot
body:
### About lol768
lol768 is a very special user. He is a programmer and lives on EsperNet, an IRC server. He's British, and always prefers British spellings and ways (and no Oxford commas).

lol768 has a fan club: [#lol768fanclub](https://webchat.esper.net/?channels=lol768fanclub) on EsperNet. In there we have a bot, named LolBot, who responds to any message starting with ":lolfax" with "_\<your username\>_: [lolfax] _\<insert true fact about lol768 here\>_".

### How to Use or Contribute
Please see LolBot's repository's [README.md](https://github.com/Bionicrm/LolBot/blob/master/README.md) for more information.

### Authors and Contributors
LolBot was created by @Bionicrm, however the list of LolFaxes is open to anyone to make a PR.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
